subject: Fwd: [TICKET-4521] Enterprise data export timeout — Zenith Financial
body:
Forwarding from our support queue.

---
Customer: Zenith Financial (Enterprise plan, $240K ARR)
Issue: Data export times out after 30s for datasets > 50K rows
First reported: Feb 4
Attempted workarounds: Smaller batch sizes (still fails at 20K)
Customer contact: Mike Torres, Director of Analytics
Severity: Critical — blocking their quarterly SEC filing
---

This is the third Enterprise customer reporting this same issue. See also TICKET-4518 (GlobalTech) and TICKET-4523 (Meridian Health).

subject: Re: Data export investigation
body:
Alex,

I've been looking into the export issue. Found the root cause: the query optimizer change we shipped in v2.14.5 (Feb 3) regressed the batch cursor logic. For datasets > 10K rows, the cursor resets to offset 0 after each batch, causing an infinite loop that eventually times out.

I have a fix ready in branch fix/export-cursor-reset (PR #356). The fix is 12 lines — just preserving the cursor state across batches. All unit tests pass but I need to test against a large dataset.

Should I deploy the hotfix to staging now? I can have it validated in 2 hours.

— Marcus
